price: 17. Mpe basangiseli Suleyman mapinga ya basoda naye ya badjini (bilima) na bato, mpe bandeke, batandanaki milongo milongo.
arabic: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيۡرِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waḥushira lisulaymāna junūduhu mina al-jini wal-insi wal-ṭayri fahum yūzaʿūna
